item.title: OpenAI Rolls Out Teen Safety Features Amid Growing Scrutiny
item.description: CEO Sam Altman announced an age-prediction system and new parental controls in a blog post on Tuesday.

item.title: Same-day delivery comes to space, as Impulse promises satellite transport in hours, not months
item.description: Impulse Space wants to ignite a revolution in in-space logistics.

item.title: Jack Altman raised a new $275M early-stage fund in a mere week
item.description: Altman's first fund, raised in early 2024, was $150 million. So this is a big step up, too.

item.title: Tesla is recalling Powerwall 2 batteries over fire risk
item.description: Tesla is recalling an unspecified number of Powerwall 2 home batteries in Australia after receiving reports of fires.

item.title: What to know about TikTok’s uncertain future in the US and the people who want to buy it
item.description: TikTok, owned by the Chinese company ByteDance, has been at the center of controversy in the U.S. for four years now due to concerns about user data p...
